notesStmt.note: "Conspiracy for pretended reformation" has special t.p.
"Conspiracy for pretended reformation" formerly identified separately as Wing C6364 (number cancelled); Wing (2nd ed., 1994) identifies this item as part of P878.
Item at reel 1791:31 includes only "Conspiracy for pretended reformation."
